column1: '''The Third Age''' is a large community on internet which hosts mods for ''[[The Lord of the Rings: The Battle for Middle-earth Anthology
column2: The Battle for Middle-Earth Anthology]]'' and has more than hundred tutorials about making modifications, modeling, coding, skinning, scripting and mapping.
